auto_resolve.description: Whether the auto resolve feature is enabled for this policy
auto_resolve.notes: Whether the auto resolve feature is enabled for this policy

created_by.description: Username of the user who created the Policy

error_on_conflict.description: Error if conflicting Alert Policies are found
error_on_conflict.notes: Error if conflicting Alert Policies are found

filter.description: Filter expression for the policy in FIQL

impact_types.description: Impact Types that are to be associated with the resulting Alert
impact_types.notes: Impact Types that are to be associated with the resulting Alert

last_updated_timestamp_in_usecs.description: Last updated timestamp of the Policy. Will be used as the CAS value during updates.
last_updated_timestamp_in_usecs.notes: Last updated timestamp of the Policy.

policies_to_override.description: List of Alert Policy Ids to override
policies_to_override.notes: List of Alert Policy Ids to override

related_policies.description: List of Alert Policies that are related to the entities of the current policy
related_policies.notes: List of Alert Policies that are related to the entities of the current policy

trigger_conditions.description: Trigger conditions for the policy. If there are multiple Trigger conditions, they will be ANDed.

trigger_wait_period_in_secs.description: Duration to wait before triggering the alert when the specified condition is met
trigger_wait_period_in_secs.notes: Duration to wait before triggering the alert when the specified condition is met

policy_ids.description: Policy Ids that are related to the specified entity
policy_ids.notes: Policy Ids that are related to the specified entity

condition.description: Conditions to be met to trigger the alert. Conditions are expressed in FIQL
condition.notes: Conditions to be met to trigger the alert

condition_type.description: Type of condition. Example types: StaticThreshold, Anomaly, SafetyZone.

severity_level.description: Threshold level to be associated with the Alert.Example levels: INFO, WARNING, CRITICAL.
severity_level.notes: Threshold level to be associated with the Alert. Example levels: INFO, WARNING, CRITICAL.

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chart_queries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

has_global_details.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

num_resolved_count.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parent_cause_id.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshooting_steps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metric_details.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metric_details.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severity_trails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severity_trails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparison_operator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

condition_type.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
condition_type.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metric_value_details.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metric_value_details.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metric_threshold_value.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metric_threshold_value.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metric_value.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metric_value.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred

auto_resolve.notes: Whether the auto resolve feature is enabled for this policy

get.dto.appliance.configuration.AlertCon.description: DTO representing the configuration of alerts

default_nutanix_email.description: Default Nutanix email to which Alert emails would be sent

enable.description: Whether Alert emails should be enabled.

enable_default_nutanix_email.description: Whether Alert emails should be enabled.

enable_email_digest.description: Whether Alert email digest should be enabled.

skip_empty_alert_email_digest.description: Send alert email digest only if there are one or more alerts.

smtp_server.description: SMTP Server used to send Alert Emails.

tunnel_details.description: Status of Remote Tunnel that is used to send Alert Emails.

cluster_uuids.description: Cluster Uuids to which this rule applies to.

impact_types.description: Impact types to which this rule applies to.

include_global_email_contact_list.description: Whether to include global email contact list.

match_phrases.description: List of phrases to match the alert with.

recipients.description: List of recipients who will receive emails.

severities.description: Severity to which this rule applies to.

address_value.description: Address of the proxy either IPv4 or IPv6

port.description: Port on which proxy is binding
port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

proxy_types.description: Proxy types to send applicable traffic
proxy_types.notes: Proxy types to send applicable traffic. Supports 'http' 'https', and 'socks' proxy configuration.

port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

server_address.description: Address of SMTP server, either IPv4 or IPv6
